title: Implement CircuitDesignAgent
description: Quantum circuit architecture expert. Tools: create_quantum_circuit, select_observables, analyze_entanglement.

title: Add stage-specific agent types
description:
GitHub Issue #4 - Expand from 2 general-purpose agents (ClassicalAgent, QuantumAgent) to 4+ stage-specific agents:

- MapAgent: Circuit creation and parameter space definition
- OptimizeAgent: Transpilation, circuit optimization, backend selection
- ExecuteAgent: Quantum execution and result collection
- PostProcessAgent: Analysis, visualization, metric computation

## Benefits
- Better separation of concerns
- Custom resource allocation per stage
- Independent evolution of agent capabilities
- Enhanced telemetry and monitoring

title: Implement OptimizationAgent
description: Circuit transpilation and optimization expert. Tools: transpile_circuit, analyze_gate_structure, estimate_optimization_benefit.

title: Create multi-agent workflow graph
description: Update workflow to route between specialized agents. Implement StateGraph with agent nodes and conditional routing.

title: Implement OrchestratorAgent (supervisor)
description: High-level planning and coordination agent. Tools: create_workflow_plan, evaluate_progress, decide_next_action.

title: Enable agent-to-agent consultation mechanism
description: Implement the ability for agents to consult each other with domain-specific questions and receive expert responses.

title: Create SharedMemory class for agent communication
description: Implement shared context accessible by all agents including message passing between agents and experiment history storage.

title: Implement ExecutionAgent
description: Quantum execution and resource optimization. Tools: run_estimator, batch_measurements, adaptive_sample, select_backend.

title: Create BasePatternAgent base class
description: Base class for all pattern stage agents with execute_stage(), log_metric(), get_metrics() methods.

title: Multi-Agent Collaboration with LLM-Powered Communication
description:
GitHub Issue #8 - Phase 4 implementation: Convert single-orchestrator architecture into multi-agent collaborative system where specialized agents can consult each other using LLM-powered reasoning.

## Context
Phases 1-3 complete (Issue #5):
- Phase 1: Agentic Orchestrator Foundation
- Phase 2: Stage-Level Decision Points  
- Phase 3: Feedback Loops & Iteration

## Proposed Agents
- OrchestratorAgent (Supervisor)
- CircuitDesignAgent (circuit expertise)
- OptimizationAgent (transpilation expertise)
- ExecutionAgent (measurement strategy)
- AnalysisAgent (result interpretation)
- MetaAgent (cross-experiment learning) - optional

title: Implement AnalysisAgent
description: Result interpretation and visualization. Tools: create_visualization, compute_statistics, interpret_results.

title: Create BaseCollaborativeAgent base class
description: Base class for collaborative agents with LLM reasoning, consultation methods, and tool integration.

title: Create AgentFactory for stage-specific agents
description: Factory to instantiate correct agent type per stage. Support both legacy (classical/quantum) and new (stage-specific) types.

title: Multi-agent system testing and integration
description: Unit tests for each agent, integration tests for multi-agent workflow, test agent consultation flows, test with CHSH pattern.

title: Implement agent message passing protocol
description: Define and implement the protocol for agents to post questions/responses to each other via shared memory.
